title: x402 envelope
description: Minimal x402-style envelope describing verb, version, and routing metadata.

verb.description: Canonical verb name (e.g., summarize, analyze, fetch).

version.description: Semantic version of the verb contract implemented by this payload.

entry.description: Optional x402 entry URI for this verb on a given agent (e.g., x402://summarizeagent.eth/summarize/v1).

reply_to.description: Optional address or URI where responses/receipts should be delivered.

tenant.description: Optional tenant or account identifier in multi-tenant systems.

network.description: Optional blockchain or network context (e.g., mainnet, base, optimism).

extras.description: Optional extension bag for implementation-specific routing/metadata.
